info.title: Solar Performance Insight API
info.description:
The backend RESTful API for Solar Performance Insight.

# Introduction

On this page, you'll find documentation for the Solar Performance
Insight API.  The API primarily serves the Solar Performance Insight
dashboard, but power users may interact with it directly. An OpenAPI
generator such as
[https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator](https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator)
may be used to generate client libraries for a number of languages to
interact with the API. A download link for the OpenAPI spec can be
found above.

# Authentication

The API is secured via OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect with
[Auth0](https://auth0.com) as the identity provider. We require valid
JSON Web Token (JWT) from Auth0 to be included as a Bearer token in
the Authorization header for API access. When [requesting a
token](https://auth0.com/docs/api/authentication#authorization-code-flow-with-pkce46),
the audience must be set to `https://app.solarperformanceinsight.org/api`, the Client ID must be set to
`G7Cag1LvitX0sOUOrYz03xv6xyl3bE9s`, and the token endpoint is `https://solarperformanceinsight.us.auth0.com/`.  Most tokens
are set to expire in 3 hours, and Auth0 rate limits requests, so users
are advised to reuse a token for as long as it is valid. One Python
library that can automatically refresh the tokens is
[Authlib](https://docs.authlib.org/en/latest/client/oauth2.html#oauth2session-for-password).

pdc0.title: Pdc0
pdc0.description: DC power input which produces the rated AC output power at the nominal DC voltage of the inverter

PVWattsInverterParameters.description: DC-AC power conversion parameters of an inverter for the PVWatts model

PVWattsLosses.title: PVWattsLosses
PVWattsLosses.description: Parameters describing the PVWatts system loss model

PVWattsModuleParameters.title: PVWattsModuleParameters

pdc0.title: Pdc0
pdc0.description: Power of the modules at 1000 W/m^2 and cell reference temperature

gamma_pdc.title: Gamma Pdc
gamma_pdc.description: Temperature coefficient of power in units of 1/C. Typically -0.002 to -0.005 per degree C

PVWattsModuleParameters.description: Parameters for the modules that make up an array in a PVWatts-like model

PVsystModuleParameters.title: PVsystModuleParameters

alpha_sc.title: Alpha Sc
alpha_sc.description: Short-circuit current temperature coefficient of the module in units of A/C

mu_gamma.title: Mu Gamma
mu_gamma.description: Temperature coefficient for the diode ideality factor, 1/K

I_L_ref.title: I L Ref
I_L_ref.description: Light-generated current (or photocurrent) at reference conditions,in amperes

I_o_ref.title: I O Ref
I_o_ref.description: Dark or diode reverse saturation current at reference conditions,in amperes

R_sh_ref.title: R Sh Ref
R_sh_ref.description: Shunt resistance at reference conditions, in ohms

R_sh_0.title: R Sh 0
R_sh_0.description: Shunt resistance at zero irradiance conditions, in ohms

R_s.title: R S
R_s.description: Series resistance at reference conditions, in ohms

cells_in_series.title: Cells In Series
cells_in_series.description: Number of cells connected in series in a module

R_sh_exp.title: R Sh Exp
R_sh_exp.description: Exponent in the equation for shunt resistance, unitless

EgRef.title: Egref
EgRef.description: Energy bandgap at reference temperature in units of eV. 1.121 eV for crystsalline silicon.

PVsystModuleParameters.description: Parameters for the modules that make up an array in a PVsyst-like model

PVsystTemperatureParameters.title: PVsystTemperatureParameters

u_c.title: U C
u_c.description: Combined heat loss factor coefficient, units of W/m^2/C

u_v.title: U V
u_v.description: Combined heat loss factor influenced by wind, units of (W/m^2)/(C m/s)

eta_m.title: Eta M
eta_m.description: Module external efficiency as a fraction

PVsystTemperatureParameters.description:
Parameters for the cell temperature model of the modules in a
PVSyst-like model

SandiaInverterParameters.title: SandiaInverterParameters

Paco.title: Paco
Paco.description: AC power rating of the inverter, W

Pdco.title: Pdco
Pdco.description: DC power which produces the rated AC output power at the nominal DC voltage of the inverter, W

Vdco.title: Vdco
Vdco.description: Nominal DC voltage at which the AC power rating is determined, V

Pso.title: Pso
Pso.description: DC power required to start the inversion process, assumed equal to self consumption by the inverter, W

C0.title: C0
C0.description: Parameter defining the curvature of the relationship between AC power and DC power at reference operating conditions, 1/W

C1.title: C1
C1.description: Empirical coefficient allowing Pdco to vary linearly with DC voltage input, 1/V

C2.title: C2
C2.description: Empirical coefficient allowing Pso to vary linearly with DC voltage input, 1/V

C3.title: C3
C3.description: Empirical coefficient allowing C0 to vary linearly with DC voltage input, 1/V

Pnt.title: Pnt
Pnt.description: AC power consumed by the inverter when no AC power is exported  (i.e., night tare), W

SandiaInverterParameters.description:
DC-AC power conversion parameters of an inverter for Sandia's
Grid-Connected PV Inverter model

gcr.title: GCR

SingleAxisTracking.description: Parameters for a single axis tracking array
